Network Management

Collaboration diagram for Network Management:

Modules

 NMT Master
 

NMT master provides mechanisms that control and monitor the state of nodes and their behavior in the network.


 NMT Slave
 

The NMT Slave methods are called automatically when a NMT message from Master are received.
